sentences.en: "Now watch it, Patsy," the Sergeant told her.
At first, Chan seems to be a hapless patsy to Tucker's bullying.
sentences.cn: 起初, 成龙像是个老受塔克欺负的倒霉蛋.
戴维斯不会上任何人的当。

sentences.en: He has long felt that Ray was set up, that he was a patsy.
sentences.cn: 他一直觉得雷是被人陷害的，他是个糊涂蛋。

sentences.en: Patsy : Oh, please get me a cup of decaffeinated coffee.
sentences.cn: 帕齐: 请给我一杯无咖啡因的咖啡.

sentences.en: Patsy Archuleta, 56, walks her 5 - year - old grandson, Alexander Vigil, home from school.
sentences.cn: 帕齐阿丘利塔, 56, 散步,她5 岁 的孙子, 亚历山大守夜, 从学校回家.

sentences.en: Patsy could hardly be heard above the baby's yowls.
sentences.cn: 在婴儿的号哭声中很难听清帕齐在说些什么。

sentences.en: Patsy had picked up the baby and was bouncing him on her knee.
sentences.cn: 帕齐抱起婴儿放在膝上颠动着。

sentences.en: Patsy had to clench her jaw to suppress her anger.
sentences.cn: 帕奇只得咬紧牙关压住怒气。

sentences.en: Patsy heard Peter's voice. She pressed the CALL button on her radio.
sentences.cn: 帕特西听到了彼得的声音, 她按了一下呼叫按钮.

sentences.en: Patsy keeps asking every day when you'll be back.
Patsy sat quietly and stroked the fur of her sleeping cat.
sentences.cn: 佩西静静地坐著,抚摸她那熟睡中的猫的毛.

sentences.en: Patsy seemed to have the kind of resilience which would be helpful to her in future.
sentences.cn: 佩西似乎有一种不折不挠的气质,这对她今后的工作有帮助的.

sentences.en: She outgrew her clothes so rapidly that Patsy was always having to buy new ones.
sentences.cn: 她长得太快，衣服很快便穿不下了，帕齐只好经常给她买新衣服。

sentences.en: That guy over there looks like a perfect patsy.
sentences.cn: 那边那小子看上去很容易上当受骗.

sentences.en: You picked the son of a company man to be our patsy?
sentences.cn: 你选了公司里人的儿子做替罪羊?

words.tran_cn: 懦夫（复数patsies）；容易受骗的人

trans.tran_en: someone who is easily tricked or deceived, especially so that they take the blame for someone else’s crime
